jcr:content.awardContent1: Selected recipients are eligible to receive one of three scholarship amounts: $5,000 1st place scholarship $3,000 2nd place scholarship $1,000 3rd place scholarship
jcr:content.awardReq1: Registered, active Girl Scouts members who have received the Girl Scout Gold Award At least 15 years of age Demonstrated practical citizenship in school, Girl Scouting and the community Enrolled in high school at the time of selection.
